column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My first ever Classic Chicago Deep Dish Pizza certainly did not disappoint. I had the Malnati Chicago Classic and WOW! it was very tasty. The sausage and cheese blended perfectly with the sauce
column3: not soggy at all. The pizza was preceeded by a Chicken Caesar Salad: warm chicken
column5: crunchy croutons with just the right amount of their delicious salad dressing. Of course
column8: was extremely helpful in asking questions and making excellent suggestions. This gem certainly deserves a 5 star rating.
